shef.nlp.wordnet.similarity
Class ICMeasure

java.lang.Object
  shef.nlp.wordnet.similarity.SimilarityMeasure
      shef.nlp.wordnet.similarity.PathMeasure
          shef.nlp.wordnet.similarity.ICMeasure
Direct Known Subclasses:
JCn, Lin
public abstract class ICMeasure
extends PathMeasure

An abstract class that addes information content based methods to the top level similarity measure class but doesn't itself define a similarity measure.

Author:
Mark A. Greenwood

Configures the similarity measure using the supplied parameters.

Overrides:
config in class PathMeasure
Parameters:

Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs while configuring the similarity measure.
